properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 2 at 10:19AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale
and Marengo Counties.

.Heavy rainfall over the next few days is expected to produce rises
along the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam, and levels are
forecast to rise into flood stage. Minor flooding may occur in the
surrounding low lying areas by Wednesday night... A flood warning is
now in effect for the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Wednesday evening until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At 10:00 AM Monday The stage Was 83.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday night and continue
to rise to near 91.5 feet by early Friday morning.
* Impact...At 90 feet...Pasture and wood lands begin to flood.
Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
